title: Place a Customer's Order on Credit Hold
description: A customer with overdue invoices places a new order. The system must automatically place the new order on credit hold.

tasks.description: A new order is placed by a customer who is over their credit limit or has overdue invoices.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system identifies the customer's poor credit status.

tasks.description: The system automatically places the new order on 'Credit Hold' status, preventing it from being fulfilled.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is successfully put on hold.

tasks.description: An alert is sent to the credit department to review the account and contact the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The credit department is notified to resolve the issue with the customer.
